description:
Everything in the world seems to be falling over! People, animals, vehicles - nothing seems to get away from it. Harumi and the others are visiting the Ueno Zoo when suddenly everything starts falling over - themselves included.
It turns out it is all the cunning ploy of a spirit of course - but not just any spirit this time - it`s a spirit that Enma-kun knew when he was little, and the reason he is doing all this is to try and get hold of the flame crown that Enma is always wearing!
It also seems like the spirit has some interesting secrets about Enpi-chan as well...
Source: Official Site

titles.title: のんびり這おうよ, おいらたち
